name: Trash Boi
description:
In Trash Boi you are a so-called Gutmensch, which tries to rescue the world by stopping the pollution.

You are in a small park, where other scumbag people are throwing away their trash. You have to collect the trash before it's too late! The global pollution level is increasing, the more trash is thrown away.

But beware! The scumbags have smartphones and call in friends. If you don't interrupt them, your park will be filled up with people and tons of trash.

Mechanics Trash

You can collect the trash by walking over it. 

People

People are your enemies! They will throw away trash and increase the world pollution. And sometimes they will call in some friends. If you don't interrupt them by walking by, your park will be full of people and trash.

Game Over

Keep an eye on the world pollution. If the bar is full, our world is doomed! And you lose.

Controls

WASD
